mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, m.perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.sort FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type IN ('M', 'C') AND m.status = 0 AND r.status = 0 AND m.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.sort

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 0 AND r.status = 0 AND m.deleted = 0 AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != ''
